# `reshape_to_data_point`

reshape_to_data_point


## Description

reshape a mesh grid line object to data point matrix


## Usage

```r
reshape_to_data_point(mesh_grid_obj)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`mesh_grid_obj`     |     mesh_grid_obj
